name: CleanGoogle v2
description: This is re-imagination of CleanGoogle with more customization options and with new implementation of Google Material 2. Google tends to test new feature really frequently and result of that the theme might not function well, please be pacient and wait for my fix. I am will no longer support the theme with new updates, feel free to use it to expand the theme I started. Customization Options - Switch between Fully White and Blend of Images styles - Choose your favorite images or gifs View customization guide & Image install guide at Google Docs.
additional_info: Please DM me if you encounter a bug or some issue before rating the theme Changelog [9/03/19] - Fixed ugly elements showing on front page and searched page [2/09/19] - Fixed white color bug [1/28/19] - Fixed overflow of Header image when searching for place or restaurant [1/14/19] - Added a guide how to install image you might like from this theme [1/12/19] - Fixed unstyled arrow next to link & Highlited link to show what others searching for [12/5/18] - Rounded Random Number Generator & Main search information Card Image [12/2/18] - Cleaned and Rounded Finance & Shop Info Cards [12/1/18] - Initial Release of v2. ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰ðŸŽ‰
